TopicTitle: KSP Interstellar Power Transmitter doesn't seem to be working...

Articles.Content:
So here's my test: I have a vehicle I launched with a transmitter and a fusion reactor. It doesn't seem to be working... at all. I'm not really sure what I'm doing wrong, but I've had this issue before.
